We encourage you to take your time, read questions carefully, and provide consistent answers to earn the full reward. For this survey you are still awarded for your contribution.

survey.html:
Welcome to our survey!
The survey will take around 15 minutes for you to complete. Please answer each question on your screen before proceeding to the next screen. If you require a break at any stage, you can close your browser and return to the survey at a later time. All you need to do to resume is return to the My Survey portal and the survey will be waiting for you.

radio.label: QWBIR
radio.title:
We believe in research
We want to remind you that the company sponsoring this survey relies on the results to make key business decisions. Therefore, it’s very important that you provide considered and accurate responses.
You’ll notice simple questions unrelated to the survey topic, they’re part of our quality controls, to ensure you’re paying attention.
If you fail these questions, the survey may be treated as invalid.
Are you happy to co-operate with these quality controls and answer this survey accurately?

term.cond: not gv.isSST() and samplingHouse.r6 and QHP.val not in ['',None]

Please enter the text in the image.
If you can’t read text, please click on the image to refresh.
If you would like to hear the text read aloud, please click the speaker icon.

pipe.label: QCtree1stText

case.label: r1
case.p:
Great! You passed the first quality check question! There will be more in later survey!
Thank you so much for paying attention to the survey. We value your considered and honest answers

pipe.case:
Unfortunately some of your recent answers indicate you may not be fully engaged in this survey. Please answer honestly as these questions are about "you" and your opinions and experiences.
Inconsistent or incomplete answers may result in this survey being cancelled and you will not be eligible to earn the credit you were offered for completion.

case.label: r3
case.p:
You have selected the incorrect answer to the previous question...
Which suggests you are not paying attention to this survey. The integrity of this research depends on your considered & honest answers.

If you fail the next quality check question,
you may not be provided the full incentive and may not be invited to complete future surveys.

survey.html: We’d like to understand more about you and your day to day banking experience.

radio.label: A1
radio.title: Which of the following best describes you when it comes to taking up new technology?
radio.row: I like to be the first to use new technology
I like to use it while it is relatively new, but like to see others using it first
I like to adopt new technology when it becomes more mainstream (ie. everyone around me using it)
I'm typically among the last to adopt new technology

select.label: A2_1
select.title: Thinking about how you approach managing your finances, including day-to-day banking, which best describes you?
select.comment: Please select one in each row.

radio.label: A3
radio.title: You said you have an everyday account with [pipe:S11b]. How satisfied are you with the following?
radio.comment: Please select one in each row.
radio.row: The bank where your everyday bank account is

radio.label: A4
radio.title: How likely are you to switch from [pipe:S11b] to a different financial institution in the next 12 months?

checkbox.label: A5_1
checkbox.title: Which of these features does [pipe:S11b] offer as part of your everyday banking account?
checkbox.row: PayID / Instant transfers - Easily and instantly transfer money to others using PayID (Mobile phone number or email)
Access to digital wallets - Securely store your cards on leading digital wallets (such as, Apple Pay and Google Pay) on any of your devices to use everyday
Webchat - Online chat with a customer representative between 9am-5pm, Monday to Saturday
Ability to bank at branch - Ability to visit a physical branch location to conduct your banking
Ability to apply online - Ability to create a new account online, without having to go in branch
Automatic variable rates based on eligibility criteria - Variable interest rate for future savings account (if eligibility criteria is met)
Support local community - Your banking allows communities to invest in local initiatives, such as, sports clubs, scholarships, infrastructure and environmental initiatives
Card controls in app - Ability to cancel card, change PIN, block merchants or order replacement cards through the app

checkbox.label: A5_2
checkbox.title: Which of these features does [pipe:S11b] offer as part of your everyday banking account?
checkbox.row: Block / unblock card in app - Ability to place a temporary block on card and stop all future transactions
Disputing transactions - Ability to dispute a transaction on your card for chargeback / fraud; fraud protection on all your transactions
Set budget for specific spend categories - Limit your weekly / monthly spend on different categories (e.g. Dining out, fashion, apparel, etc.)
Customised smart notifications - Customised smart notifications (e.g. to keep you informed of transactions, recurring bills/payments or whether you’re reaching your savings goals)
Data driven comparative spend insights - Ability to see how your spend compares to other people your age, or who live in a similar location to you
No fee on ATM withdrawals - No fees on ATM withdrawals, both domestic and international
24/7 virtual customer support - Easy & accessible virtual customer support (e.g. chatbot, virtual assistant, etc)
Ability to bank for free at local post office - Ability to access basic banking features for free at your local post office

checkbox.label: A5_3
checkbox.title: Which of these features does [pipe:S11b] offer as part of your everyday banking account?
checkbox.row: Open accounts via mobile banking app - Ability to open a new account directly through mobile banking
Setup buckets / sub accounts for savings goals - Ability to setup sub-accounts for your personal savings goals ( e.g. car, home, holiday)
No account fees - No monthly account fees
Round ups - Automatic rounding up of purchases to the nearest dollar with the extra cents going into your savings
Auto sweep / Salary sorter - Ability to automatically divide your salary into different sub-accounts/savings
Cashback on everyday spend - Cashback for everyday transactions (grocery, fuel, etc.) or for specific payment types (card on file or contactless)
Easy access to investment marketplace - Link your account to an investment marketplace to invest, track and grow your trading portfolio (shares, stocks)
Ability to view all places where my card is stored - Ability to see where your card details are stored (i.e. for monthly transactions and direct debits)
Buy Now Pay Later / Pay in instalments - Buy now, pay later option: split payments into equal instalments, paid out within a specific time frame (fortnightly, weekly, etc.

autofill.label: A5_hid
autofill.title: FLATLINER CHECK – IF SELECTED ALL CODES 1-25 DO QUALIFY AS A COMPLETE BUT FLAG

row.label: r1
row.autofill: (A5_1.but(A5_1.r99).all) and (A5_2.but(A5_2.r99).all) and (A5_3.but(A5_3.r99).all)

row.label: none
row.autofill: A5_hid.count == 0

No fee on ATM withdrawals - No fees on ATM withdrawals, both domestic and international

Ability to bank for free at local post office - Ability to access basic banking features for free at your local post office
Open accounts via mobile banking app - Ability to open a new account directly through mobile banking
Setup buckets / sub accounts for savings goals - Ability to setup sub-accounts for your personal savings goals ( e.g. car, home, holiday)
No account fees - No monthly account fees
Round ups - Automatic rounding up of purchases to the nearest dollar with the extra cents going into your savings
Auto sweep / Salary sorter - Ability to automatically divide your salary into different sub-accounts/savings

radio.label: F2
radio.title: And how likely are you [pipe:F1_text] Bendigo bank if they offered you an everyday account with these features?
radio.row: PayID / Instant transfers - Easily and instantly transfer money to others using PayID (Mobile phone number or email)
Access to digital wallets - Securely store your cards on leading digital wallets (such as, Apple Pay and Google Pay) on any of your devices to use everyday
Webchat - Online chat with a customer representative between 9am-5pm, Monday to Saturday
Ability to bank at branch - Ability to visit a physical branch location to conduct your banking
Ability to apply online - Ability to create a new account online, without having to go in branch
Automatic variable rates based on eligibility criteria - Variable interest rate for future savings account (if eligibility criteria is met)
Support local community - Your banking allows communities to invest in local initiatives, such as, sports clubs, scholarships, infrastructure and environmental initiatives
Card controls in app - Ability to cancel card, change PIN, block merchants or order replacement cards through the app
Block / unblock card in app - Ability to place a temporary block on card and stop all future transactions
Disputing transactions - Ability to dispute a transaction on your card for chargeback / fraud; fraud protection on all your transactions
Set budget for specific spend categories - Limit your weekly / monthly spend on different categories (e.g. Dining out, fashion, apparel, etc.)
Customised smart notifications - Customised smart notifications (e.g. to keep you informed of transactions, recurring bills/payments or whether you’re reaching your savings goals)
Data driven comparative spend insights - Ability to see how your spend compares to other people your age, or who live in a similar location to you
No fee on ATM withdrawals - No fees on ATM withdrawals, both domestic and international
24/7 virtual customer support - Easy & accessible virtual customer support (e.g. chatbot, virtual assistant, etc)
Ability to bank for free at local post office - Ability to access basic banking features for free at your local post office
Open accounts via mobile banking app - Ability to open a new account directly through mobile banking
Setup buckets / sub accounts for savings goals - Ability to setup sub-accounts for your personal savings goals ( e.g. car, home, holiday)
No account fees - No monthly account fees
Round ups - Automatic rounding up of purchases to the nearest dollar with the extra cents going into your savings
Auto sweep / Salary sorter - Ability to automatically divide your salary into different sub-accounts/savings
Cashback on everyday spend - Cashback for everyday transactions (grocery, fuel, etc.) or for specific payment types (card on file or contactless)
Easy access to investment marketplace - Link your account to an investment marketplace to invest, track and grow your trading portfolio (shares, stocks)
Ability to view all places where my card is stored - Ability to see where your card details are stored (i.e. for monthly transactions and direct debits)
Buy Now Pay Later / Pay in instalments - Buy now, pay later option: split payments into equal instalments, paid out within a specific time frame (fortnightly, weekly, etc.

radio.label: F2_Flatliner
radio.title: HIDDEN: STRAIGHTLINED F2

survey.html: These are the final few questions and we’d like to understand a bit more about you and your household.

radio.label: P1
radio.title: What is your total household income per annum (before tax)?

radio.label: P2
radio.title: What is the highest degree or level of education you have completed?
radio.comment: Please select one response that most applies.
radio.row: Diploma, Advanced Diploma or Associate Degree

radio.label: QC4
radio.title: Did you encounter any issues with the survey?

checkbox.label: QC5
checkbox.title: Can you please specify what type of issues you encountered?
checkbox.row: Images are blurry, but I was still able to answer properly
Images are too blurry which has affected my answers
Images are not properly aligned, but I was still able to answer properly
Images are not properly aligned which has affected my answers

radio.label: QC3
radio.title: Finally, can we just confirm the following, please select true or false for each.

checkbox.label: checkQC
checkbox.title: RECORD QUILITY OR NOT FROM QC

survey.exec: if checkQC.r2 or checkQC.r3 or checkQC.r4 or checkQC.r5 or checkQC.r6: checkQC.r1.val=0

pipe.label: pipeFinalx0
pipe.case: Thank you for your valued opinion!
That's the end of the survey!

radio.label: Finalx1
radio.title: What was your overall experience of the survey?
radio.comment: Click on a button to select.

textarea.label: Finalx3
textarea.title: We are keen to improve our surveys. Please let us know how we could have improved this survey for you?

radio.label: Finalx4
radio.title: Based on the results of this survey, we might be interested in conducting further research. Would you be interested in participating and us contacting you?
radio.row: Yes, I am happy to be contacted via email

radio.label: SC
radio.title: Speeder checks

term.cond: not gv.isSST() and (checkQC.r2 or checkQC.r3 or checkQC.r4 or checkQC.r5 or checkQC.r6)
